questions: Weather pattern of a desert differs from that of a mountain. Select the correct reason.
option2: Difference in solar energy absorbed and reflected by the environment
option3: Different animals living in that particular area

questions: What is the temperature recorded when the sun's heat reaches the lowest level?
Exhaust fans in kitchens are placed at the top near the ceiling. Which principle is applied here?
How are the wind currents set up?
option1: Warm air near the equator rises and is replaced by cooler air from the poles
option2: Warm air near the poles rises and is replaced by cooler air from the equator
option3: Cooler air near the equator rises and is replaced by warmer air from the poles
option4: Cooler air near the poles rises and is replaced by warmer air from the equator

questions: In summer, near the equator, the winds move from oceans to the land. Why?
option1: Land air is cooler and rises up which is replaced by warmer air from oceans.
option2: Land air is hotter and settles down which is replaced by cooler air from oceans.
option3: Land air is cooler and settles down which is replaced by warmer air from oceans.
option4: Land air is hotter and rises up which is replaced by cooler air from oceans.

questions: Which of the following statements are true about the wind flow?
option1: Hot winds blow from the equator to poles.
option2: Cold winds blow from poles to the equator.
option3: Cooler winds blow from 30 degrees latitude towards the equator.

option3: It has lots of clouds and rains
option4: It has the lowest temperature of the system.
